```{r}
scaled_cancer_data[,1:2] <- cancer_data[,1:2]
scaled_cancer_data[,3:18] <- scale(cancer_data[,3:18])
  
model_data <- list(N=length(scaled_cancer_data$diagnosis), y=c(scaled_cancer_data$diagnosis), x=c(scaled_cancer_data$V3))
model_stan <- rstan::stan_model(file = "models/model1.stan")
model_model <- rstan::sampling(model_stan, data = model_data)
```

```{r}
monitor(model_model)

model_log_lik <- extract_log_lik(model_model, parameter_name = "log_lik", merge_chains = FALSE)

model_r_eff <- relative_eff(exp(model_log_lik), cores = 2)

model_loo <- loo(model_log_lik, r_eff = model_r_eff, cores = 2)
print(model_loo)

pooled_k_values <- model_loo$diagnostics$pareto_k
print(model_loo$diagnostics)
hist(pooled_k_values)
```
